description: Use two cars...park one car at Moraine Lake...the other at Paradise Valley.  Start at Moraine Lake and hike up to Larch Valley...then onto Sentinel Pass.  Hike down Sentinel Pass to Paradise Valley with a great detour to Giant Steps!
directions: Take Highway 1 to Lake Louise exit...and go to Moraine Lake, dropping off a car at Paradise Valley parking lot.
title: Larch/Sentinel/Giant Steps/Paradise Valley
